title: Light orb

properties.name: description
properties.value:
Light orbs can be used to fix magical lamps in Dorgesh-Kaan. Level 52 Firemaking is needed to fix a lamp, giving 1,000 Firemaking experience. When a player has replaced 100 light orbs they will receive the message "You have replaced 100 orbs and have gained extra experience." The bonus received is 5,000 Firemaking experience. This can be repeated indefinitely.
Broken lamps are found on all three floors. The large street lamps throughout Dorgesh-Kaan never need replacing. Broken lamps can be hard to distinguish from a distance. There are always ten broken lamps, and once one is fixed, a new one will break. Broken lamps are unique to each player and are the same for the player no matter what world the player is on.

Item ID10973
A broken lamp in Dorgesh-Kaan.
A map of all possible broken lamp locations that require a new Light orb to grant Firemaking experience.

Light orbs can be used to fix magical lamps in Dorgesh-Kaan. Level 52 Firemaking is needed to fix a lamp, giving 1,000 Firemaking experience. When a player has replaced 100 light orbs they will receive the message "You have replaced 100 orbs and have gained extra experience." The bonus received is 5,000 Firemaking experience. This can be repeated indefinitely. Broken lamps are found on all three floors. The large street lamps throughout Dorgesh-Kaan never need replacing. Broken lamps can be hard to distinguish from a distance. There are always ten broken lamps, and once one is fixed, a new one will break. Broken lamps are unique to each player and are the same for the player no matter what world the player is on.

In addition to attaching cave goblin wire to empty light orbs via the Crafting skill (requires 87 Crafting, granting 104 experience), complete light orbs are sometimes obtained from Dorgesh-Kaan Average Chests, specifically from the chest on the 2nd floor in Oldak's house. Empty orbs are obtained by looting a chest only slightly more frequently than completed light orbs.

A light orb is needed for a Sherlock elite clue scroll step, and one must be crafted for a master clue scroll.

Despite the large amount of Firemaking experience given, finding the broken lamps can be time-consuming. It may be useful to make fires in the city and take quick glances at nearby lamps in hope of a broken lamp being found.

'''Light orbs''' can be used to fix [[lamp (Dorgesh-Kaan)|magical lamps]] in [[Dorgesh-Kaan]]. Level 52 [[Firemaking]] is needed to fix a lamp, giving 1,000 Firemaking experience. When a player has replaced 100 light orbs they will receive the message "You have replaced 100 orbs and have gained extra experience." The bonus received is 5,000 Firemaking experience. This can be repeated indefinitely.
Broken lamps are found on all three floors. The large street lamps throughout Dorgesh-Kaan never need replacing. Broken lamps can be hard to distinguish from a distance. There are always ten broken lamps, and once one is fixed, a new one will break. Broken lamps are unique to each player and are the same for the player no matter what world the player is on.

In addition to attaching [[cave goblin wire]] to [[Empty light orb|empty light orbs]] via the [[Crafting]] skill (requires 87 Crafting, granting 104 experience), complete light orbs are sometimes obtained from [[Chest (Dorgesh-Kaan Average)|Dorgesh-Kaan Average Chests]], specifically from the chest on the 2nd floor in [[Oldak|Oldak's]] house. Empty orbs are obtained by looting a chest only slightly more frequently than completed light orbs. 

A light orb is needed for a [[Sherlock/Elite|Sherlock elite clue scroll]] step, and one must be crafted for a [[Sherlock/Master|master clue scroll]].

Despite the large amount of [[Firemaking]] [[experience]] given, finding the broken lamps can be time-consuming. It may be useful to make fires in the city and take quick glances at nearby lamps in hope of a broken lamp being found.
